dom.element( ... ).attribute( ... ).dele.shortDescription: Delete attribute of all matching elements.

return.description: Dictionary of available functions and values for original element.

dom.element( ... ).children.shortDescription: Get children of first found matching element.

params.description: Child to get. Default: `dom.RANGE_ALL`.
params.name: selection

return.description: Dictionary of available functions and values.

dom.element( ... ).attribute( ... ).exis.shortDescription: Check if attribute of first matching element exists.

return.description: True if attribute of first matching element exists.

dom.element( ... ).style.delete.shortDescription: Delete styling property for all matching elements.

params.description: Name of styling property to delete for all matching elements.
params.name: property

return.description: Dictionary of available functions and values for original element.

dom.loaded.shortDescription: Call callback function when DOM has loaded.

params.description: Callback function to call when DOM has loaded.
params.name: callback

dom.element( ... ).html.get.shortDescription: Get the HTML content of the first found matching element.

return.description: HTML content of the first found matching element.

dom.element( ... ).text.set.shortDescription: Set the text content of all matching elements.

params.description: Text content to set.
params.name: content

return.description: Dictionary of available functions and values for original element.

dom.element( ... ).style.getAll.shortDescription: Get all styling properties from first matching element.

return.description: Dictionary of all styling properties taken from first matching element.

dom.element( ... ).style.setPush.shortDescription: Push styling properties from dictionary to all matching elements.

params.description: Dictionary of styling properties to push to all matching elements.
params.name: dict

return.description: Dictionary of available functions and values for original element.

dom.element( ... ).style.setPush.longDescription: The matching elements will have the styling properties appended, or overwritten if the styling property already exists.

dom.element( ... ).text.get.shortDescription: Get the text content of the first found matching element.

return.description: Text content of the first found matching element.

dom.element( ... ).pick.shortDescription: Pick individual element from all matching elements.

params.description: Element to get. Default: `0`.
params.name: selection

return.description: Dictionary of available functions and values.

dom.element( ... ).html.set.shortDescription: Set the HTML content of all matching elements.

params.description: HTML content to set.
params.name: content

return.description: Dictionary of available functions and values for original element.

dom.element.shortDescription: Get DOM object by selector or overrides and return properties associated with it.

params.description: DOM selector to use. Default: `"body"`.
params.name: selector

params.description: List of overrides to use instead of selector. Selector must be `""` for this parameter to register.
params.name: overrides

return.description: Dictionary of available functions and values.

dom.element( ... ).childCount.shortDescription: Get number of child elements of first found matching element.

return.description: Number of child elements of first found matching element.

dom.element( ... ).attribute.shortDescription: Do actions on the attributes of matching elements.

params.description: Name of attribute to use.
params.name: name

return.description: Dictionary of available functions.

dom.element( ... ).style.set.shortDescription: Set styling property value for all matching elements.

params.description: Name of styling property to set for all matching elements.
params.name: property

params.description: Value of styling property to set for all matching elements.
params.name: value

return.description: Dictionary of available functions and values for original element.

dom.element( ... ).newChild.shortDescription: Add child element to all matching elements.

params.description: Child element to add to all matching elements.
params.name: element

return.description: Dictionary of available functions and values for original element.

dom.element( ... ).events.ignore.shortDescription: Ignore the callback given to the future event for all matching elements.

params.description: Name of event to use.
params.name: event

params.description: Callback to ignore when the event is raised.
params.name: usedCallback

return.description: Dictionary of available functions and values for original element.

dom.element( ... ).events.listen.shortDescription: Listen to the given future event for all matching elements, and call function when the event is raised.

params.description: Name of event to listen for.
params.name: event

params.description: Callback to call when the event is raised.
params.name: callback

params.description: Use event capturing instead of event bubbling. Default is `false`.
params.name: useCapture

return.description: Dictionary of available functions and values for original element.

dom.element( ... ).events.listen.longDescription: Event bubbling is where the event handling is passed from the first child all the way to the root element. Event capturing is going the other way.

dom.element( ... ).attribute( ... ).set.shortDescription: Set attribute content of all matching elements.

params.description: Text content to set.
params.name: content

return.description: Dictionary of available functions and values for original element.

dom.element( ... ).attribute( ... ).get.shortDescription: Get the text content of the first found matching element's attribute.

return.description: content of the first found matching element's attribute.

dom.element( ... ).parent.shortDescription: Get parent of first found matching element.

return.description: Dictionary of available functions and values.

dom.element( ... ).style.get.shortDescription: Get styling property from first mathing element.

params.description: Name of styling property to get from first matching element.
params.name: property

return.description: Value of styling property taken from first matching element.

dom.new.shortDescription: Create new DOM object by element name without attaching it to DOM.

params.description: Name of element to specify.
params.name: name

return.description: Dictionary of available functions and values.
